data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The old person I admire most is my grandfather. To me, he is a hero, an ideal father, a benevolent person, and a man of honor. He is around 75 years old now. We live in a joint family, and he is still the head of our family. Though he can’t manage every aspect of our family due to his age, yet he is still the decision-maker for our family. I remember him from my early childhood when he used to play chess with me. He taught me many things, including the value of honesty and punctuality. He told me some of his great adventures in his life through stories, and those stories are still inspiring for me. He is a person of his word. He would not talk much, but when he does, it carries unparalleled weights. He is a benevolent person, as I have seen him helping many people in our locality. He was an educated person and a successful father, as all of them are successful professionals and businessmen now. I revere my grandparents for his acute observation and significant decisions. I like him so much that I want to become a person like him.（200 字）
data.referenceText: Describe an older person that you admire. How long have you known them? And why do you look up to them?
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个你钦佩的老人。你认识他们多久了?你为什么尊敬他们?
